headers.subject: [tosdr:1705] [Info] Spotify's TOS is only translated into a few languages

html:
Although Spotify allows users to choose their country (Andorra, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Monaco, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, United States), the terms themselves are only available in English, French, German, and Spanish.

https://www.spotify.com/us/legal/end-user-agreement/

My guess is that Spotify isn't available in Asia? If that's the case, this makes sense.

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: [Info] Spotify's TOS is only translated into a few languages
text:
Although Spotify allows users to choose their country (Andorra, Australia, 
Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, 
Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Monaco, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Spain, 
Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, United States), the terms themselves 
are only available in English, French, German, and Spanish.

https://www.spotify.com/us/legal/end-user-agreement/

My guess is that Spotify isn't available in Asia? If that's the case, this 
makes sense.
